name: Senior System Analyst
description:
At Aram Meem, our mission is connecting people to all their needs all around delivery. Among our partners are a wide network of restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and many other stores and retailers, and our application is constantly evolving. As we are growing fast and constantly changing, we are keen on giving our team members the opportunity to share their unique perspectives, tackle new challenges and pursue rewarding careers.


We are now looking for a well-organized, bright, inquisitive, and energetic Senior System Analyst to join the back-end development team. This team is the technical engine of the company as we utilize our data to help us determine the best solutions for our processes. In this role, you will be responsible for systematic analysis of development tasks. You will also work with developers on RnD tasks, working cross-functionally to explore trends and identify opportunities to create value.

Remote work and/or relocation to Cyprus can be considered.

Responsibilities:

  • Interact with foreign clients and colleagues.
  • Identify business needs and transform them into clear understandable requirements.
  • Work with tasks at the junction of several systems, conduct inter-team communications, jointly choosing the optimal solution.
  • Helping to intelligently break large tasks into parts and bring tasks to completion and compliance with the formulated Acceptance criteria

Requirements:

  • Demonstrated work experience of at least five years in system analysis and at least three years in business analysis.
  • Exceptional communication and organization skills.
  • Skills in using BPMN Notation, describing interaction contracts systems (json, raml), composing and reading Sequence Diagrams.
  • Advanced experience with Jira and Confluence.
  • Good command of the English language both verbal and written.

Will be considered an advantage:

  • Experience in UX-design.
  • Previous experience collaborating with the development team.
  • Knowledge of PlantUML.
  • Experience in designing CRM and ERP systems.
  • Documentation maintenance and skills in working with a project in Git.
  • Intermediate experience in SQL (you able to create complex database queries).
